medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment identifying the type and function of a message relating to a regulatory cross border function and to transmit its identifying number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the date, and/or time, of a process relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary amount relating to the document. For example, the total of all invoice amounts declared in a single declaration.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying a government procedure relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment identifying a rate of exchange and/or currency relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, A segment identifying an account and a related financial institution for payments of duties/taxes/fees relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Geographical position
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GPO, A segment identifying the geographical position of the location at the time of declaration.

medi:segment.name: Language
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LAN, A segment identifying the language relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment identifying a measure relating to the document, e.g. validity duration.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying locations and times relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a place or location relating to the document, e.g. place at which a declaration was issued, the location at which a declaration is lodged.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date, time or period relating to the location, e.g. scheduled date of goods departure at the place of loading, date of arrival at port or airport with intent to unload.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment specifying an address related to the location

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying processing and valuation information relating to the location.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment identifying processing information relating to the the location, e.g. information relating to the determination of freight amounts.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary amount relating to a valuation, e.g. aggregate cost of freight, insurance and all other costs and expenses from the foreign exit location to the entry location.

medi:segment.name: Payment terms
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PYT, A segment identifying a code describing the terms of payment relating to the valuation.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments identifying government requirements and information concerning the locations and contact parties of the government offices relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Governmental requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GOR, A segment identifying a requirement for specific government actions, reasons for such action requested or requirements of procedure relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a place or a location and/or related locations pertaining to the government requirements and/or actions.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date, time or period

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment identifying processing information relating to the governmental requirements

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments identifying contact parties pertaining to the government agencies, with their related communication numbers.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person or department associated with a government agency.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication address of a contact person or department.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments identifying process status conditions relatings to the document.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment identifying a process status relating to the document after filing, e.g. accepted, cancelled.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time when a status applies.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments identifying related document positions for a status.

medi:segment.name: Error point details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ERP, A segment identifying the related document position for a status.

medi:segment.name: Data element usage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ELU, A segment identifying a data element at the related document position.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments identifying the parties relevant to the document, with their related references, contacts, communication numbers, their status and quality assurance particulars.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party relevant to the document.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date, time and/or period relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment identifying quality assurance details relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment identifying a status relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying a regulatory procedure relating to the party.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments identifying contact persons or departments with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person or department relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication address relating to the contact person or department.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments identifying other documents relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment identifying another document relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference within a related document.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time pertaining to the related document, such as the issue date.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary amount pertaining to the related document.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment identifying a type of exemption or condition pertaining to the related document.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying a quantity pertaining to the related document.

medi:segment.name: Transport service requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TSR, A segment identifying contract and carriage conditions pertaining to the related document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments identifying a party and their contact information pertaining to the related document.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party pertaining to the related document, e.g. the party responsible for issuing, authenticating or using the document.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying the type of address, like business, residential, etc.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments identifying contact persons or departments with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person or department relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication address relating to the contact person or department.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments identifying locations pertaining to the related document.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to identify a place or a location pertaining to the related document.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date, time or period relating to the location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments identifying requirements for the provision of additional information pertaining to the document.

medi:segment.name: Requirements and conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RCS, A segment identifying a requirement for the provision of additional information pertaining to the document.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment identifying a statement pertaining to the requirement.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date/time/period pertaining to the requirement.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment indicating the need for a certificate of export pertaining to the requirement.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment identifying a request to override normal processing pertaining to the requirement.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments identifying document positions pertaining to the requirement.

medi:segment.name: Error point details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ERP, A segment identifying the document position pertaining to the requirement.

medi:segment.name: Data element usage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ELU, A segment identifying a data element at the document position.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 15: A group of segments identifying reasons for adjustment of a document.

medi:segment.name: Adjustment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: AJT, A segment identifying a reason for adjustment of a document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments identifying document positions pertaining to the adjustment..

medi:segment.name: Error point details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ERP, A segment identifying a document position pertaining to the adjustment.

medi:segment.name: Data element usage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ELU, A segment identifying a data element at the document position.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 17: A group of segments identifying error information relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Application error information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ERC, A segment identifying error information relating to the document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 18: A group of segments identifying document positions relating to the error.

medi:segment.name: Error point details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ERP, A segment identifying a document position relating to the error.

medi:segment.name: Data element usage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ELU, A segment identifying a data element at the document position.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 19: A group of segments identifying instructions for certification relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Parties and instruction
medi:segment.medi:documentation: INP, A segment identifying an instruction for certification relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date/time relating to the instruction.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relating to the instruction.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment used for reporting the results of an inspection or to provide the quantity used for control or quarantine purposes

medi:segment.name: Result
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RSL, A segment identifying control results relating to the instruction.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 20: A group of segments identifying certifying parties relating to the instruction.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a certifying party relating to the instruction.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying the type of address, like business, residential, etc.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the certifying party.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 21: A group of segments identifying contact persons or departments with their related communication numbers, relating to the certifying party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person or department with their related communication numbers, relating to the certifying party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication address relating to the contact person or department.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 22: A group of segments identifying documentary undertakings pertaining to the document.

medi:segment.name: Related identification numbers
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIR, A segment identifying a documentary undertaking pertaining to the document.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location where a documentary undertaking is not valid.

medi:segment.name: Value list identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: VLI, A segment identifying details relating to the documentary undertaking, e.g. given in cash, bond or as a written guarantee.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the documentary undertaking, e.g. the expiry date.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary amount pertaining to the related documentary undertaking

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 23: A group of segments identifying parties relating to the documentary undertaking.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party relating to the documentary undertaking, e.g. the surety party, i.e. the party who agrees to be responsible for the debt or obligation of another party.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying the type of address, like business, residential, etc.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the party.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 24: A group of segments identifying contact persons or departments with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person or department with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication address relating to the contact person or department.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 25: A segment group with process information related to the documentary undertaking

medi:segment.name: Process identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRC, A segment identifying a process.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence relating to the process

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the process

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 26: A group of segments identifying details relating to duties, taxes or fees relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment identifying details relating to a duty, tax or fee relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date relating to the duty, tax or fee, e.g. date on which tax is due or calculated or in certain cases, the date used at the discretion of the filer as the basis for duty calculation.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment identifying a type of duty regime or exemption relating to the duty, tax or fee.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying an amount relating to the duty, tax or fee.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying a quantity relating to the duty, tax or fee.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 27: A group of segments identifying payment details relating to the duty, tax or fee.

medi:segment.name: Payment instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAI, A segment identifying a method of payment relating to the duty, tax or fee.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference number relating to the payment.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary amount relating to the payment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date relating to a payment, e.g. due date.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 28: A group of segments identifying documentary undertakings pertaining to the payment.

medi:segment.name: Related identification numbers
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIR, A segment identifying a documentary undertaking pertaining to the payment.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location where a documentary undertaking is valid.

medi:segment.name: Value list identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: VLI, A segment identifying details relating to the documentary undertaking, e.g. given in cash, bond or as a written guarantee.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the documentary undertaking, e.g. the date when the guarantee or undertaking must be accounted for.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying monetary amounts in relation to a documentary undertaking.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 29: A group of segments identifying parties relating to the documentary undertaking.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party relating to the documentary undertaking, e.g. the surety party, i.e. the party who agrees to be responsible for the debt or obligation of another party.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying the type of address, like business, residential, etc.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the party.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 30: A group of segments identifying contact persons or departments with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person or department with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication address relating to the contact person or department.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 31: A segment group with process information related to the documentary undertaking

medi:segment.name: Process identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRC, A segment identifying a process.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence relating to the process

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the process

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 32: A group of segments identifying packages relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Package
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAC, A segment identifying the number and type of a package relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence relating to the package.

medi:segment.name: Package identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCI, A segment identifying marks and numbers relating to the package.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment describing the type of packing material relating to the package.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment identifying processing information relating to the handling of the package.

medi:segment.name: Dimensions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DIM, A segment identifying the dimensions of the package.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment identifying the volume of the package.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 33: A group of segments identifying temperature conditions relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Temperature
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TMP, A segment identifying a temperature or range of temperatures relating to the document, e.g. the temperature required to be maintained for a commodity or the recorded temperature.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment identifying a storage condition relating to the temperature condition.

medi:segment.name: Dangerous goods
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DGS, A segment identifying a flashpoint for dangerous goods relating to the temperature condition.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 34: SG35-SG36-SG39-SG44-SG50-SG53 A group of segments identifying details about the means of transport relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Transport information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment identifying details about the means of transport relating to the document, e.g. scheduled conveyance identifier.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying date and time information relating to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying references relating to a means of transport, e.g. ships stay reference.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying a quantity relating to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment identifying a measure relating to the means of transport, e.g. a ship's gross or net tonnage.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary amount relating to the means of transport, e.g. type and value of ship's bunkers.

medi:segment.name: Purpose of conveyance call
medi:segment.medi:documentation: POC, A segment identifying a purpose of call relating to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Dimensions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DIM, A segment identifying a dimension relating to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Nature of cargo
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GDS, A segment identifying a nature of cargo relating to the means of transport, e.g. ballast or cargo type.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment identifying a status relating to the means of transport, e.g. security category.

medi:segment.name: Geographical position
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GPO, A segment identifying the geographical position of the location at the time of declaration relating to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment identifying processing information relating to the transport means

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 35: A group of segment with ShipToShipActivity information.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence relating to the ship to ship activity.

medi:segment.name: Event
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EVE, A segment to describe information relating to an event in relation to the means of transport, such as a security incident.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and or time relating to an event.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to describe information relating to the means of transport, e.g. a ship to ship activity, reasons related to a status of the means of transport and for exceptional reporting.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 36: A group of segments identifying locations relating to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relating to the means of transport, e.g. port of call.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence relating to a location.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and or time relating to a location.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment identifying a status relating to the means of transport at the time of making a declaration, e.g. security category.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment identifying information relating to the means of transport status.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment identifying processing information relating to the location

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 37: A group of segments identifying Ship to ship activities relating to the location (Itinerary).

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence relating to a ship to ship activity.

medi:segment.name: Event
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EVE, A segment identifying the description of a ship to ship activity.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying dates relating to a ship to ship activity.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment identifying free text relating to a ship to ship activity.

medi:segment.name: Geographical position
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GPO, A segment identifying the geographical position relating to a ship to ship activity.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 38: A group of segments identifying sub-location information related to a location

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment specifying an address related to a sub-location

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence relating to a sub-location

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment identifying information relating to a sub- location.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying dates relating to a sub-location.

medi:segment.name: Purpose of conveyance call
medi:segment.medi:documentation: POC, A segment identifying information about the purpose of call relating to a sub-location

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment identifying processing information relating to the sub-location

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 39: SG40-SG41-SG42-SG43 A group of segments identifying parties relating to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party relating to the means of transport, e.g. the master of the vessel, the company security officer, ISPS responsible party.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence of an event related to a means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment identifying an attrubite of a person related to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying the type of address, like business, residential, etc.

medi:segment.name: Nationality
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAT, A segment identifying the nationality of the party, e.g. of the owner or master.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date relating to the party, e.g. birth date of the master.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying an address relating to the party, e.g. the address of a crew member.

medi:segment.name: Employment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EMP, A segment identifying a qualification relating to the party, e.g. hazardous cargo handling.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment identifying a status of a person or party associated with a means of transport eg type of endorsement for a crew member.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment identifying processing information relating to the person on board e.g. whether information in relation to the person has been verified.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference in a relation to the person on board.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 40: A group of segments identifying contact persons or departments with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person or department with their related communication numbers, relating to the party, e.g. the 24 hour contact details concerning security.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication address relating to the contact person or department.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 41: A group of segments identifying details of a driver's license relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment identifying an address recorded on a driver's license relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Employment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EMP, A segment identifying a qualification relating to the driver's license.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 42: A group of segments identifying Additional documents and travel documents, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment identifying a travel document relating to the person on board, e.g. passport, visa etc.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party relating to the travel document, e.g. party responsible for issuing the document.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the travel document e.g. it's issue date and expiry date.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relating to the travel document, e.g. location of issue.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 43: A group of segments identifying effects, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence of personal effects relating to a party.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment identifying details to identify personal effects carried on a means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying the total quality of personal effects belonging to a person on a means of transport.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 44: SG49 A group of segments identifying transport equipment details relating to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment identifying transport equipment details relating to the means of transport, e.g. an event or load status of transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence relating to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying quantities relating to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment identifying a legal status relating to the transport equipment, e.g. whether the transport equipment is in conformity with the Container Convention.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference in relation to carried transport equipment, such as a registered name of a barge.

medi:segment.name: Requirements and conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RCS, A segment identifying the action codes relating to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the means of transport.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 45: A group of segments identifying seal information affixed to a transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Seal number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEL, A segment identifying a seal affixed to a transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence relating to the seal affixed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 46: A group of segments identifying parties relating to the transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party relating to the transport equipment, e.g. the owner of a transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying the type of address, like business, residential, etc.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the party.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 47: A group of segments identifying contact persons or departments with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person or department with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication address relating to the contact person or department.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 48: A group of segments identifying locations relating to the transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relating to the transport equipment, e.g. a stow position.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 49: A group of segments identifying Carried transport equipments, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence relating to the carried transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment identifying transport equipment details relating to the carried transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference in relation to carried transport equipment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 50: A group of segments identifying bunkers, stores items and waste items related to a transport means.

medi:segment.name: Line item
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LIN, A segment identifying a line item and configuration.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying physical measurements, including dimension tolerances, weights and counts.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a place or a location and/or related locations.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 51: A group of segments identifying commodities related to a stores item or bunker.

medi:segment.name: Goods item details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GID, A segment indicating totals of a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment providing free form or coded text information.

medi:segment.name: Charge/rate calculations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TCC, A segment specifying charges.

medi:segment.name: Dangerous goods
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DGS, A segment identifying dangerous goods.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 52: A group of segments identifying sub-location information related to a location

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment specifying an address related to a location

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence relating to a location

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to a location

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 53: A group of segments identifying characteristics related to a transport means.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic/class id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CCI, A segment identifying and describing a specific characteristic and its relevance for subsequent business processes.

medi:segment.name: Characteristic value
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CAV, A segment providing the value of a characteristic.

medi:segment.name: Section control
medi:segment.medi:documentation: UNS, A service segment placed at the beginning of the detail section to indicate the beginning of that section.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 54: SG66-SG69-SG74-SG75-SG76-SG78-SG79-SG80-SG108- SG109 A group of segments identifying goods shipment details.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying a position in a sequence of goods shipments.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment identifying additional information relating to the goods shipment, e.g. the nature of a transaction.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying information details relating to the goods shipment, e.g. free trade status.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the goods shipment, e.g. the departure date of goods from the original consignor, the date on which the goods depart from a last location of country of export.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference relating to the goods shipment, e.g. UCR.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 55: A group of segments identifying parties relating to the goods shipment.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party relating to the goods shipment, e.g. buyer, seller, consignor, consignee, distributor.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying the type of address, like business, residential, etc.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Document/message summary
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DMS, A segment identifying a document reference relating to the party.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 56: A group of segments identifying contact persons or departments with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person or department with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication address relating to the contact person or department.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 57: A group of segments identifying locations relating to a goods shipment.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relating to a goods shipment, e.g. country from which goods were originally exported without any commercial transaction taking place in intermediate countries.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the location, e.g. the date when the declared goods belonging to a goods shipment were brought into a warehouse.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 58: A group of segments identifying documents relating to the goods shipment.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment identifying a document relating to the goods shipment, e.g. invoice.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence of documents.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment idintifying references relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary amount relating to the document, e.g. aggregate total amount.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment identifying additional information relating to the document, e.g. request to override normal processing.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying a quantity relating to the document, e.g. total quantity specified in the invoice.

medi:segment.name: Transport service requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TSR, A segment identifying contract and carriage conditions relating to the document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 59: A group of segments identifying parties relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party relating to the document, e.g. party responsible for issuing and authenticating the invoice.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying the type of address, like business, residential, etc.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 60: A group of segments identifying contact persons or departments with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person or department with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication address relating to the contact person or department.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 61: A group of segments identifying locations relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relating to the document, e.g. location of issue.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 62: A group of segments identifying processing information relating to the goods shipment.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment identifying processing information relating to the determination of Customs value relating to the goods shipment, e.g. indicators related to the method of valuation.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary amount relating to the processing information, e.g. aggregate cost of freight, insurances, loading and unloading charges.

medi:segment.name: Payment terms
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PYT, A segment identifying the terms of payment relating to the processing information, e.g. cash on delivery, sight draft, 90 days letter of credit.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment identifying a rate of exchange and/or currency relating to the goods shipment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 63: A group of segments identifying locations relating to the processing information.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relating to the processing information, e.g. loading location.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 64: A group of segments identifying requirements for the provision of additional information pertaining to the goods shipment.

medi:segment.name: Requirements and conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RCS, A segment identifying a requirement for the provision of additional information pertaining to the goods shipment.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment identifying a statement pertaining to the requirement.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date/time/period pertaining to the requirement, e.g. suggested date and time of completion of the service.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment indicating the need for for a certificate of export pertaining to the requirement.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment identifying a request to override normal processing pertaining to the requirement.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 65: A group of segments identifying document positions pertaining to the requirement.

medi:segment.name: Error point details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ERP, A segment identifying the document position pertaining to the requirement.

medi:segment.name: Data element usage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ELU, A segment identifying a data element at the document position.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 66: A group of segments identifying instructions for certification relating to the goods shipment.

medi:segment.name: Parties and instruction
medi:segment.medi:documentation: INP, A segment identifying an instruction for certification relating to the goods shipment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date/time relating to the instruction.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relating to the instruction, e.g. location of review of documents and the place of examination.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment used for reporting the results of an inspection or to provide the quantity used for control or quarantine purposes

medi:segment.name: Result
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RSL, A segment identifying discrete or non-discrete result as a value or value range relating to the instruction.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 67: A group of segments identifying certifying parties relating to the instruction.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a certifying party relating to the instruction.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying the type of address, like business, residential, etc.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the certifying party.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 68: A group of segments identifying contact persons or departments with their related communication numbers, relating to the certifying party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person or department with their related communication numbers, relating to the certifying party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication address relating to the contact person or department.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 69: A group of segments identifying details relating to duties, taxes or fees relating to the goods shipment.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment identifying details relating to a duty, tax or fee relating to the goods shipment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date relating to the duty, tax or fee, e.g. date on which tax is due or calculated or in certain cases, the date used at the discretion of the filer as the basis for duty calculation.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment identifying a type of duty regime or exemption relating to the duty, tax or fee.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying an amount relating to the duty, tax or fee.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying a quantity relating to the duty, tax or fee.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 70: A group of segments identifying payment details relating to the duty, tax or fee.

medi:segment.name: Payment instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAI, A segment identifying a method of payment relating to the duty, tax or fee.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference number relating to the payment.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary amount relating to the payment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date relating to a payment, e.g. due date.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 71: A group of segments identifying documentary undertakings pertaining to the payment.

medi:segment.name: Related identification numbers
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIR, A segment identifying a documentary undertaking pertaining to the payment.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location where a documentary undertaking is not valid.

medi:segment.name: Value list identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: VLI, A segment identifying details relating to the documentary undertaking, e.g. given in cash, bond or as a written guarantee.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the documentary undertaking, e.g. the date when the guarantee or undertaking must be accounted for.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 72: A group of segments identifying parties relating to the documentary undertaking.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party relating to the documentary undertaking.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying the type of address, like business, residential, etc.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the party.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 73: A group of segments identifying contact persons or departments with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person or department with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication address relating to the contact person or department.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 74: A group of segments identifying government requirements and information concerning the locations and contact parties of the government offices relating to the goods shipment.

medi:segment.name: Governmental requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GOR, A segment identifying a requirement for specific government actions, reasons for such action requested or requirements of procedure relating to the goods shipment.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a place or a location and/or related locations pertaining to the government requirements and/or actions.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 75: A group of segments identifying measurements relating to the goods shipment.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment identifying a measurement relating to the goods shipment, e.g. first, second and third tariff quantities, gross weight.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying a quantity relating to the measurement.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 76: A group of segments identifying process status conditions related to the goods shipment.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment identifying a process status related to the goods shipment, e.g. accepted, cancelled.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time when a status applies.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 77: A group of segments identifying related document positions for a status.

medi:segment.name: Error point details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ERP, A segment identifying the related document position for a status.

medi:segment.name: Data element usage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ELU, A segment identifying a data element at the related document position.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 78: A group of segments identifying temperature conditions relating to the goods shipment.

medi:segment.name: Temperature
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TMP, A segment identifying a temperature or range of temperatures relating to the goods shipment, e.g. the temperature required to be maintained for a commodity or the recorded temperature.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment identifying a storage condition relating to the temperature condition.

medi:segment.name: Dangerous goods
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DGS, A segment identifying a flashpoint for dangerous goods relating to the temperature condition.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 79: A group of segments identifying delivery terms relating to the goods shipment.

medi:segment.name: Terms of delivery or transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TOD, A segment identifying delivery terms relating to the goods shipment (INCOTERMS).

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relating to the delivery terms, e.g. departure point.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment identifying processing information relating to the delivery terms, e.g. whether the place specified for the performance of a contractual obligation is located in the same country as where the declaration is made.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 80: SG85-SG89-SG91-SG94-SG95-SG96-SG100 A group of segments identifying consignment details relating to the goods shipment.

medi:segment.name: Consignment information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNI, A segment identifying a consignment relating to the goods shipment.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference relating to the consignment, e.g. a number assigned by a carrier.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment identifying processing information relating to the consignment, e.g. the indication that the goods are not transported in a container.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment identifying status information relating to the consignment.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment identifying a control total relating to the consignment, e.g. cubic dimension.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying a quantity relating to the consignment, e.g. the boarded quantity.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary amount relating to the consignment, e.g. consigment value.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying information details relating to the consignment, e.g. a regulatory procedure to be applied.

medi:segment.name: Terms of delivery or transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TOD, A segment identifying delivery terms relating to the goods shipment (INCOTERMS).

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 81: A group of segments identifying parties relating to the consignment.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party relating to the consignment, e.g. the carrier, notify party, or owner of the transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying the type of address, like business, residential, etc.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the party.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 82: A group of segments identifying contact persons or departments with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person or department with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication address relating to the contact person or department.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 83: A group of segments identifying locations relating to the consignment.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relating to the consignment, e.g. storage country.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the location, e.g. scheduled date of departure.

medi:segment.name: Array information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ARR, A segment identifying the sequence relating to the location (e.g. routing country).

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment specifying an address relating to a location

medi:segment.name: Transport placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TPL, A segment specifying a placement of goods or equipment in relation to the transport used, relating to a location

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 84: A group of segments identifying processing and valuation information relating to the location.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment identifying processing information relating to the determination of Customs value at the location, such as information relating to the determination of freight amounts.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary amount relating to a valuation. For example, aggregate cost of freight, insurance and all other costs and expenses from the foreign exit location to the entry location.

medi:segment.name: Payment terms
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PYT, A segment identifying a code describing the terms of payment relating to the valuation, e.g. cash on delivery, sight draft, 90 days letter of credit.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 85: A group of segments identifying documents and associated information relating to the consignment.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment identifying a document relating to the consignment, e.g. transport contract, licenses, certificates, permits.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the document, e.g. the issue date.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary amount relating to the document, e.g. aggregate total amount.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment identifying additional information relating to the document, e.g. request to override normal processing.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying a quantity relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Transport service requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TSR, A segment identifying contract and carriage conditions relating to the document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 86: A group of segments identifying parties relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party relating to the document, e.g. party responsible for issuing the document.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying the type of address, like business, residential, etc.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 87: A group of segments identifying contact persons or departments with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person or department with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication address relating to the contact person or department.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 88: A group of segments identifying locations relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relating to the document, e.g. location of issue.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and/or time relating to the location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 89: A group of segments identifying requirements for the provision of additional information pertaining to the consignment.

medi:segment.name: Requirements and conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RCS, A segment identifying a requirement for the provision of additional information pertaining to the consignment.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment identifying a statement pertaining to the requirement.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date/time/period pertaining to the requirement, e.g. suggested date and time of completion of the service.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment indicating the need for for a certificate of export pertaining to the requirement.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment identifying a request to override normal processing pertaining to the requirement.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 90: A group of segments identifying document positions pertaining to the requirement.

medi:segment.name: Error point details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ERP, A segment identifying the document position pertaining to the requirement.

medi:segment.name: Data element usage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ELU, A segment identifying a data element at the document position.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 91: A group of segments identifying instructions for certification relating to the consignment.

medi:segment.name: Parties and instruction
medi:segment.medi:documentation: INP, A segment identifying an instruction for certification relating to the consignment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date/time relating to the instruction.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relating to the instruction, e.g. location of review of documents and the place of examination.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment used for reporting the results of an inspection or to provide the quantity used for control or quarantine purposes

medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment identifying details about the means of transport relating to the consignment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying date and time information relating to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying references relating to a means of transport, e.g. ships stay reference.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment identifying a quantity relating to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment identifying a measure relating to the means of transport, e.g. a ship's gross or net tonnage.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary amount relating to the means of transport, e.g. type and value of ship's bunkers.

medi:segment.name: Purpose of conveyance call
medi:segment.medi:documentation: POC, A segment identifying a purpose of call relating to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Dimensions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DIM, A segment identifying a dimension relating to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to describe information relating to the means of transport, e.g. a ship to ship activity, reasons related to a status of the means of transport and for exceptional reporting.

medi:segment.name: Nature of cargo
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GDS, A segment identifying a nature of cargo relating to the means of transport, e.g. ballast or cargo type.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment identifying a status relating to the means of transport, e.g. security category.

medi:segment.name: Geographical position
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GPO, A segment identifying the geographical position of the location at the time of declaration relating to the means of transport.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 187: A group of segments identifying locations relating to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relating to the means of transport, e.g. port of call.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence relating to the location.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date and or time relating to a location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 188: A group of segments identifying parties relating to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party relating to the means of transport, e.g. the master of the vessel, the company security officer, ISPS responsible party.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying the type of address, like business, residential, etc.

medi:segment.name: Nationality
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAT, A segment identifying the nationality of the party, e.g. of the owner or master.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date relating to the party, e.g. birth date of the master.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying an address relating to the party, e.g. the address of a crew member.

medi:segment.name: Employment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EMP, A segment identifying a qualification relating to the party, e.g. hazardous cargo handling.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication address relating to the contact person or department.
