medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference relating to the document information.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date, and/or time, or period relating to the document information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 288: A group of segments identifying transport equipment details relating to the consignment.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment identifying transport equipment details relating to the consignment.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence relating to the transport equipment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 289: A group of segments identifying details about the means of transport relating to the consigment.

medi:segment.name: Transport information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment identifying details about the means of transport relating to the consignment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 290: A group of segments identifying locations relating to the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location relating to the means of transport, e.g. port of call.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence relating to the location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 291: SG295-SG296-SG297-SG298 A group of segments identifying item details relating to the house consignment.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence of items relating to the consignment.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference relating to the consignment item, e.g. the unique identifier assigned by the trader to goods covered by the consignment Item.

medi:segment.name: Transport information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment identifying information regarding the transport relating to the consignment item

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying monetary amounts related to the consignment item

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment identifying physical measurements related to the consignment item

medi:segment.name: Terms of delivery or transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TOD, A segment identifying terms of delivery or transport related to the consignment item

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a place or a location and/or related locations related to the consignment item

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 292: A group of segments identifying parties relating to the consignment item.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party relating to the consignment item.

medi:segment.name: Information detail
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IFD, A segment identifying the type of address, like business, residential, etc.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 293: A group of segments identifying contact persons or departments with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person or department with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication address relating to the contact person or department.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 294: A group of segments identifying document information related to the consignment item

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment identifying document details relating to the document information.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying references relating to the document information.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date, and/or time, or period relating to the document information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 295: A group of segments identifying requirements for the provision of additional information pertaining to the consignment item.

medi:segment.name: Requirements and conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RCS, A segment identifying a requirement for the provision of additional information pertaining to the consignment item.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment identifying a statement pertaining to the requirement.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 296: A group of segments identifying packages relating to the consignment item.

medi:segment.name: Package
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAC, A segment identifying the number and type of a package relating to the consignment item.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence relating to the number and type of a package.

medi:segment.name: Package identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCI, A segment identifying marks and numbers relating to the package.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 297: A group of segments identifying transport equipment details relating to the consignment item.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment identifying transport equipment details relating to the consignment item.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the position in a sequence relating to the transport equipment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 298: A group of segments identifying commodities relating to the consignment item

medi:segment.name: Goods item details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GID, A segment identifying a commodity relating to the consignment item.

medi:segment.name: Item description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IMD, A segment identifying a qualified description relating to the commodity.

medi:segment.name: Charge/rate calculations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TCC, A segment identifying a tariff class relating to the commodity, e.g. the classification under the harmonized system.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 299: A group of segments identifying temperature conditions relating to the commodity.

medi:segment.name: Temperature
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TMP, A segment identifying a temperature or range of temperatures relating to the commodity.

medi:segment.name: Dangerous goods
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DGS, A segment identifying a flashpoint for dangerous goods relating to the temperature condition.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 300: A group of segments identifying goods shipments relating to the consignment

medi:segment.name: Document/message summary
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DMS, A segment identifying summary information relating to the document/message relating to the goods shipments

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the sequence number relating to the document/message relating to the goods shipments

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 301: A segment identifying a party relating to the government agency goods item.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party relating to the government agency goods item.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 302: A group of segments identifying contact persons or departments with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person or department with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication address relating to the contact person or department.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 303: A group of segments identifying goods items relating to the goods shipment

medi:segment.name: Line item
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LIN, A group of segments identifying a government agency goods item relating to the goods shipment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 304: A segment identifying a party relating to the government agency goods item.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party relating to the government agency goods item.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 305: A group of segments identifying contact persons or departments with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person or department with their related communication numbers, relating to the party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying a communication address relating to the contact person or department.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 306: A group of segments identifying commodities relating to the consignment item (for LPCO usage only).

medi:segment.name: Goods item details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GID, A segment identifying a commodity relating to the consignment item.

medi:segment.name: Charge/rate calculations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TCC, A segment identifying a tariff class relating to the commodity, e.g. the classification under the harmonized system.

medi:segment.name: Section control
medi:segment.medi:documentation: UNS, A segment separating the detailed section and the summary section.

medi:segment.name: Authentication result
medi:segment.medi:documentation: AUT, A segment identifying authentication details relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment identifying control totals relating to the document.
